text: Kaya ajunaparyanta imana rakhanaryankarita ti vela nahi ali ki tyanci hrdaye allahacya smaranane ani je satya avatarita jhale ahe tyane komala vhavita, ani tya lokansarakhi na vhavita, jyanna yancya purvi grantha pradana kela gela, maga jevha tyancyavara eka dirgha mudata lotali, tevha tyanci hrdaye kathora jhalita ani tyancyapaiki adhikansa duracari aheta
